includedAssets.title: The Heart Of The Truest Believer
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep1 - The Heart Of The Truest Believer
includedAssets.synopsis: As the Jolly Roger sets sail for Neverland, Henry flees the sinister Lost Boys. Season three premiere.

includedAssets.title: Lost Girl
includedAssets.synopsis: As the search for Henry continues, Peter Pan appears and gives Emma a map, but unless she accepts her "true identity", it will be blank.

includedAssets.title: Quite A Common Fairy
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep3 - Quite A Common Fairy

includedAssets.title: Nasty Habits
includedAssets.synopsis: As Gold and Neal are reunited, in flashback, Rumplestiltskin looks for Baelfire after he follows an entrancing musician.

includedAssets.title: Save Henry

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: As the Jolly Roger sets sail to rescue Henry, dangerous magical threats lie in wait for the residents of Storybrooke. Dramatic third season of the magical fairy-tale drama starring Jennifer Morrison and Ginnifer Goodwin.

includedIn.title: Once Upon A Time
includedIn.synopsis: After her long-lost son suddenly reappears, Emma Swan is taken to Storybrooke, a mysterious town whose residents bear a striking resemblance to fairy-tale characters. There she must find her parents, defeat a wicked queen and break a dark curse.
